text:
Hi all
I'm facing an issue while trying the NodeSDK, using the hfc package. 
I have enrolled a user, say, userA successfully and I'm able to deploy, invoke and query, using the typical `user.deploy()`,`user.invoke(...)` and `user.query(...)` commands. However, when I try retrieving the _role_ of this particular user using `stub.readCertAttribute(...)`, it returns empty.

I'm using v0.6. The users are a part of the `membersrvc.yaml` as well.
